message.body: Any ideas for a restaurant for this weekend?
I heard Barbuzzo was good, are you into that?
Looks pretty good. I'll send out a group message and see what everyone else wants to do. I don't really care so I'll let everyone decide via menus.
Coolio.

Hola mi amigos! So I made a reservation at white dog cafe because so far I had more votes for it and I didn't want to wait any longer. The bad thing is that the reservation is at 815. I hope that's okay. I figured if we wanted to go somewhere after, we could.
Me too!!! I made a reservation for 10 people. In the off chance that boyfriends can't come, I can change the number.
Okie dokie!
Hey Jen, how much does it cost to take the train to Suburban Station? Actually, how does any of it work (where can I buy tickets, what are the stops, is it easier to take the bus)?
I've never taken the bus, but you can take the Paoli/thorndale line at market east station and it stops right at suburban station.
Actually...at market east, you can take any train to suburban station on tracks 3 & 4.
I'm thinking of driving to Broad, parking there, going underground (can I do that?), and catching a train to Suburban. Is that an option?
I thought you meant suburban square at first....although I don't know where you're starting
I'm coming from my house. I just want to avoid parking and traffic in Center City.

Hmmmmmm....I don't know what the transpo is like from you. My guess is that there's a broad street line (the Orange line) somewhere, but it stops at certain stops. Like near me, it's broad and Ellsworth or broad and tasker.
I would check septas website? It lists all the stops of the Orange line.
I'm nervous about this. Just want to deal with driving around the city :(
*don't want
I might just do that. Maybe I'm making it scarier than it actually is in my head.
I think so. Cause I was always nervous but it's not too bad.
I'm paranoid. Even more so especially since i heard the news story about the woman who was attacked at one of the stops. Guess I just have to be aware and know what I'm doing.
Why not just drive then?
Traffic and parking.
Mmmmm. Okay then!
Adjusted to the weight, not adjusted to the spakliness! Haha. It constantly catches my eye.
I'll be fine hahahah! How's your finger feeling? Has it adjusted to that extra weight??? ;)
